channel.title: Elisabeth Gray
channel.description: A repository of personal and academic work created by Elisabeth Gray

item.title: It's Almost Time
item.description: I'm nearly finished compiling the preliminary list of sources for my research project outline, so I'll write more interesting posts here soon. In the meantime, take a look at some of the past papers I've written and let me know what you think in the comments section.

item.title: Academic Papers and Comment Functionality Added
item.description: Most of my academic papers from graduate school are posted, and you can now leave comments, as well. Please feel free to peruse what's available and leave feedback!

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome! I'm just starting to put together a collection of my academic papers, and projects will follow shortly after. Over the course of the next several months, I'll begin to use this site as the base of my work toward a final research project. Check back for more information soon.
